title: JK-domo, Kouya wo Yuke
sinopse:
The student council secretary gets expelled from school and is shipped to a "Death Row Planet." However, after encountering a high school girl, he finds that he was accidentally sent to the girl's planet instead of the boy's planet. Will they be able to escape from this endless wasteland?

(Source: Shounen Gahousha, translated)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Routine no Hakobune
